Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to requiring annual fair housing testing
Summary: Relates to requiring annual fair housing testing; defines fair housing testing; requires the attorney general to conduct yearly fair housing testing to ensure compliance with the human rights law.
LawCode: Amd ยง292, add ยง295-a, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring annual fair housing testing
